text:
Any thoughts on what the general minimum browser support should be for this framework?

I’m thinking IE 11.
but I could see some people saying edge and up.
We still include 11 for stuff but I want to drop that thing like the bass
I agree, at my company we still include 11 as well
My personal feeling is that people using IE should be punished

Unfortunately our clients that have people on IE tend to be our bigger better paying clients so we just have to eat our feelings on it but I want to throw up big banners saying “GET A REAL BROWSER” if someone’s using IE
Yeah a lot of people using it are at the mercy of their enormous company’s IT dept so it isn’t really their fault.
But I still blame them for my problems.

My brother is an IT specialist - one of the guys in charge of maintaining big companies infrastructure like that. I’ve told him our woes for years, he’s been upgrading every company he’s worked at to use Chrome or have an open usage policy so people can use the browser they want to use.

Like having a man on the inside
Glad to know someone is fighting the good fight.
I just imagined them as cruel goblins writhing their hands, saying, “stupid front-end devsesssss”
I should send him a “thank you for your service” card and stick an IE sticker on it with a marker :no_entry_sign:  over it
Please do, I will cover postage
